original_text: When he arrived, he sounded the trumpet in the hill country of Ephraim. Then the people of Israel went down with him from the hill country, and he was their leader.
korean_text: 그가 이르러 에브라임 산지에서 나팔을 불매 이스라엘 자손이 산지에서 그를 따라 내려오니 에훗이 앞서 가며

sentences.original_text: he sounded the trumpet in the hill country of Ephraim.
Then the people of Israel went down with him from the hill country,
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 이스라엘 백성들이 그와 함께 산지에서 내려왔습니다,
